tr.metin:
Opera sanatçısı arkadaşım Zehra Öztan, emekli olmaya karar verdiğinde Opera’daki son çalışmalarının fotoğraflarını çekmemi istedi. İki yıldan fazla bir süre fotoğraflarını çektim. O dönem opera sanatçılarının emekli olmalarını teşvik için ikramiyelerinde de büyük bir artış vardı.

Arkadaşım Ekim 2016'da emekli olunca bir yaşlı bakım merkezi açtı, ben de fotoğraflarını çekmeye devam ettim. Çalıştığı dönemde, annesi yaşlı ve hastaydı, iyi bir bakım sağlayabilmek için oldukça zorluk çekmişlerdi. Sahibi oldukları Özel İlgievi Huzurevi ve Yaşlı Bakım Merkezi’ni tamamladıktan sonra diğer yaşlılarla birlikte annesine de burada bakmaya başladı.

Bir süre sonra Özel İlgievi Huzurevi ve Yaşlı Bakım Merkezi Zehra ve eşi Cem Bey’in evleri gibi oldu. Oğlu, gelini, torunu da sık sık gidip geliyor, merkezdeki faaliyetlere katılıyorlardı.

ozgecmis.metin: 1953 yılında Çorum’da doğdu. İlk ve ortaokulu Çorum’da bitirdi. Ankara İlk Öğretmen Okulun'dan Mezun olduktan sonra Ticaret ve Turizm Yüksek Öğretmen Okulu Muhasebe bölümünü bitirdi. (Gazi Üniversitesi Ticaret ve Turizm Mesleki Eğitim Fakültesi) Kırıkkale Ticaret Lisesi, Ankara Bahçelievler Deneme Lisesi, Ayrancı Ticaret Meslek liselerinde Muhasebe öğretmeni olarak çalıştı. 2008 yılında emekli oldu. Çocukluğunda babasının fotoğraf makinesi ile daha sonrada kendi fotoğraf makinesi ile fotoğraf çekmeye devam etti. Emekli olduktan sonra FSK da ilk temel eğitimimi aldı.  Çeşitli atölyelere katıldı. Anadolu Üniversitesi Açık Öğretim Fakültesi Fotoğrafçılık ve kameramanlık bölümünü bitirdi.  FSK’nın Açtığı karma sergilerde yer aldı.  Doğa, Gezi, Portre Fotoğrafları çekiyor.  Fotoğraf çekmek hayat tarzı oldu.

en.metin:
When my opera singer friend Zehra Öztan decided to retire, she asked me to take photos of her last performances at the opera. I took her photos for more than two years.

When my friend retired in October 2016, she opened a care center for the aged and I continued to take her photos. When she was working at the opera, her mother was old and sick, they had difficulty in providing her good care. After completing Özel İlgievi, Nursing Home and Elderly Care Center, she started to take care of her mother there with the other elderlies.

After a while, the center became like home for Zehra and her husband Cem. Her son, bride, and grandchild also often go there and participate in activities held there.

ozgecmis.metin: She was born in Çorum in 1953. She finished primary and secondary school in Çorum. After graduating from Ankara Primary Teacher School, she graduated from the Accounting Department of the Trade and Tourism Higher Teacher School. (Gazi University Faculty of Commerce and Tourism Vocational Education) She worked as an Accounting teacher at Kırıkkale Trade High School, Ankara Bahçelievler Deneme High School and Ayrancı Trade Vocational High Schools. She retired in 2008. In his childhood, she continued to take pictures with her father's camera and later with her own camera. After retirement, she received her first basic education at FSK. She participated in various workshops. She graduated from Anadolu University Open Education Faculty Photography and videography department. She took part in mixed exhibitions opened by FSK. Taking Nature, Travel, Portrait Photographs. Taking pictures became a lifestyle.

galeri.yazi: Zehra and Cem Öztan pose before performing on stage of Verdi’s Attila Opera on the State Opera and Ballet stage.
Zehra Öztan is waiting for the start of the game with her friends in the backstage.

Batıkent Turkish Art Music Ensemble gives a special concert to the residents of the Nursing Home. Along with Zehra, Cem and employees, some residents like Sevil, Kifayet, Yaşar, İcmal, and Sevim accompany the songs while watching the concert.
Sevil Özen, one of the residents of the nursing home, touches her chin tenderly while chatting with Zehra Öztan.
Zehra Öztan chat with Suna and Aysel while visiting the lounges on each floor.
Zehra Öztan is taking Turan to his room in the garden. Turan, aviator, was Bülent Ecevit’s private pilot during his prime ministry period.

Nurgül Soyuer, one of the residents of the nursing home, stays in the same room with her husband Sebati Soyuer, who has Alzheimer's disease, and takes care of her husband. Retired colonel Sebati Soyuer served as a courier between Rauf Denktaş and Bülent Ecevit during the Cyprus Peace Operation.

Alzheimer's patient Sebati Soyuer is fed with liquid because he has forgotten how to eat. Nurgül Soyuer is very worried about the scarcity of liquid food bags due to the increase in foreign currency. Disposable bags are washed and refilled in order to feed Sebati.

Painter Asım Yücesoy works in his workshop at Özel İlgievi. An empty room on the 5th floor was arranged as a painting workshop for Asım Bey, who stays in the center with his wife, who also needs care. Asım plans to give painting lessons here.
While Zehra Öztan is chatting with Prof. Dr. Cavidan Akören from the Faculty of Dentistry, who came to visit her mother in Özel İlgievi, Cem Öztan talks about his teeth problems.

Zehra Öztan is organizing the hall of the house they just moved to. Zehra and Cem has sold the house where they used to live while they were founding Özel İlgievi. This house in Bağlıca is close to their business. The curtains they ordered for the hall have not arrived yet.
Zehra’s bride Victoria Öztan and Personnel Manager İrina Markariani perform Caucasian dance in Özel İlgievi.
